name: Example 1: Right-skewed tree
description: Tests preorder traversal on a right-skewed tree as shown in the first example.

name: Example 2: Mixed tree with left and right children
description: Tests preorder traversal on a tree with both left and right children, as in the second example.

name: Example 3: Empty tree
description: Tests the edge case where the tree is empty.

name: Example 4: Single node tree
description: Tests preorder traversal on a tree with only one node.

name: Left-skewed tree
description: Tests preorder traversal on a left-skewed tree (all nodes have only left children).

name: Full binary tree of height 2
description: Tests preorder traversal on a complete binary tree of height 2.

name: Tree with negative values
description: Tests preorder traversal on a tree containing negative values.

name: Tree with duplicate values
description: Tests preorder traversal on a tree where all nodes have the same value.

name: Tree with only left and right children at root
description: Tests preorder traversal on a tree with root and two children.

name: Tree with null children in between
description: Tests preorder traversal on a tree with nulls interleaved between right children.
